content: Until now, glue tests have been hardcoded to use RustGlue.roc and Rust platforms. I've just filed a PR to allow tests to be written for languages other than Rust in preperation for me starting to write a proper ZigGlue.roc!
I fumbled a bit with git, some build files were comitted and some actual code files got lost :sweat_smile:. Should be fixed now!
